channel.title: Xbox live gamers topic
channel.description:
[i]any 1 play xbox 360 live?? i do, its gr8, my fave game is rainbow six vegas... i have a friend who i know on xbox ive for over 3 years now, im just guna start this topic for ppl who play xbox li8ve or for ppl who WANT to but duno if thay want to pay for it....
post your storys on here and have a laugh, anything funny, annoying, stupid, or anytring els happen to you? post it here....
glitches... clans.... clan wars... fave games, antything u like ^_^
whats your fave game hay ?? ( hope not halo 2 ... )
so... post a story sumthing funny... im w8ing for a laugh :) or a clan battle :P [/i][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 22:02:02[/size][hr]oh BTW im ( gamertag ) BreakMyRevenge, i have many other soalreaver, xXDevil CryXx SPCT Moderator, ssaakick and RemovedHate, if u add me make shure its BreakMyRevenge, i never use any other ^_^
